headline: Auto Tariffs Add $2,000 to New Car Prices
summary: New tariffs are increasing car prices by nearly $2,000 per vehicle, impacting consumer sales and shifting the outlook for electric vehicle adoption in the US.

raw.headline: Auto Tariffs Add $2,000 to New Car Prices
raw.summary: New tariffs are increasing car prices by nearly $2,000 per vehicle, impacting consumer sales and shifting the outlook for electric vehicle adoption in the US.

headline: Feds question Ford in hands-free driving investigation
summary: The top federal vehicle safety regulator has sent Ford an exhaustive list of questions about its hands-free driver-assistance system known as BlueCruise. It's the latest development in an investigation that started more than one year ago following two fatal crashes involving the software.

raw.headline: Feds question Ford in hands-free driving investigation
raw.summary: The top federal vehicle safety regulator has sent Ford an exhaustive list of questions about its hands-free driver-assistance system known as BlueCruise. It's the latest development in an investigation that started more than one year ago following two fatal crashes involving the software.

headline: Trump’s Chip Tariff Threat Sparks Pushback From Auto Industry to Tech
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Blowback to President Donald Trump’s idea of tariffs on imported semiconductors is proving to be broad and deep, stretching from auto companies and boat makers to the technology industry and crypto enthusiasts, according to a review of more than 150 public comments on the proposal.Most Read from BloombergBezos Wedding Draws Protests, Soul-Searching Over Tourism in VeniceUS State Budget Wounds Intensify From Trump, DOGE Policy ShiftsCommuters Are Caught in Johannesburg's Taxi Feuds

headline: The Presidio Group Exclusively Advises Patriot Automotive Group on the Sale of a New Hampshire Nissan Dealership
summary: SALEM, N.H., June 24, 2025--The Presidio Group LLC ("Presidio"), an independent merchant banking firm focused on mergers and acquisitions, capital raising and investments in the automotive retail and consumer mobility sectors, exclusively advised Patriot Automotive Group owner Adam Arens on the sale of a New Hampshire Nissan dealership to brothers James and Erik Kirste.

headline: Ford to recall nearly 133,000 Aviator SUVs in US over vehicle parts detachment
summary: Ford is recalling 132,914 Aviator SUVs in the U.S. over parts, including rear door window bars, getting detached from the vehicle due to insufficient adhesion, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.

raw.headline: Ford to recall nearly 133,000 Aviator SUVs in US over vehicle parts detachment
raw.summary: Ford is recalling 132,914 Aviator SUVs in the U.S. over parts, including rear door window bars, getting detached from the vehicle due to insufficient adhesion, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.

headline: South African Auto Firms Bracing for Tariffs Face Pay-Talks Test
summary: (Bloomberg) -- A potential deadlock over pay increases for South Africa’s automotive sector workers risks shutting down an industry that accounts for more than a fifth of the nation’s manufacturing output, weighing on an already moribund economy.
